newProjectRoot.description: Path where new projects will be created.

defaultProject.description: Default project name used in commands.

defaultCollection.description: The default schematics collection to use.

packageManager.description: Specify which package manager tool to use.

versionMismatch.description: Show a warning when the global version is newer than the local one.

analytics.description: Share anonymous usage data with the Angular Team at Google.

uuid.description: Analytics sharing info universally unique identifier.

environment.description: Configure in which environment disk cache is enabled.

enabled.description: Configure whether disk caching is enabled.

defaultCollection.description: The default schematics collection to use.

prefix.description: The prefix to apply to generated selectors.

sourceRoot.description: The root of the source files, assets and index.html file structure.

oneOf.description: Specifies the source locale of the application.
Localization options to use for the source locale

code.description: Specifies the locale code of the source locale

baseHref.description: HTML base HREF to use for the locale (defaults to the locale code)

oneOf.description: Localization file to use for i18n
Localization files to use for i18n
Localization options to use for the locale
Localization file to use for i18n
Localization files to use for i18n

baseHref.description: HTML base HREF to use for the locale (defaults to the locale code)

builder.description: The builder used for this package.

defaultConfiguration.description: A default named configuration to use when a target configuration is not provided.

configurations.description: A map of alternative target options.

defaultConfiguration.description: A default named configuration to use when a target configuration is not provided.
A default named configuration to use when a target configuration is not provided.

SchematicsAngularApplicationSchema.title: Angular Application Options Schema
SchematicsAngularApplicationSchema.description: Generates a new basic application definition in the "projects" subfolder of the workspace.

projectRoot.description: The root directory of the new app.

name.description: The name of the new app.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the application?

inlineStyle.description: Include styles inline in the root component.ts file. Only CSS styles can be included inline. Default is false, meaning that an external styles file is created and referenced in the root component.ts file.

inlineTemplate.description: Include template inline in the root component.ts file. Default is false, meaning that an external template file is created and referenced in the root component.ts file.

viewEncapsulation.description: The view encapsulation strategy to use in the new application.

routing.x-prompt: Would you like to add Angular routing?

prefix.description: A prefix to apply to generated selectors.

style.description: The file extension or preprocessor to use for style files.

x-prompt.message: Which stylesheet format would you like to use?

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the application.

skipPackageJson.description: Do not add dependencies to the "package.json" file.

minimal.description: Create a bare-bones project without any testing frameworks. (Use for learning purposes only.)

strict.description: Creates an application with stricter bundle budgets settings.

SchematicsAngularClassSchema.title: Angular Class Options Schema
SchematicsAngularClassSchema.description: Creates a new, generic class definition in the given or default project.

name.description: The name of the new class.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the class?

path.description: The path at which to create the class, relative to the workspace root.

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new class.

type.description: Adds a developer-defined type to the filename, in the format "name.type.ts".

SchematicsAngularComponentSchema.title: Angular Component Options Schema
SchematicsAngularComponentSchema.description: Creates a new, generic component definition in the given or default project.

path.description: The path at which to create the component file, relative to the current workspace. Default is a folder with the same name as the component in the project root.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the component?

displayBlock.description: Specifies if the style will contain `:host { display: block; }`.

inlineStyle.description: Include styles inline in the component.ts file. Only CSS styles can be included inline. By default, an external styles file is created and referenced in the component.ts file.

inlineTemplate.description: Include template inline in the component.ts file. By default, an external template file is created and referenced in the component.ts file.

viewEncapsulation.description: The view encapsulation strategy to use in the new component.

changeDetection.description: The change detection strategy to use in the new component.

prefix.description: The prefix to apply to the generated component selector.

style.description: The file extension or preprocessor to use for style files, or 'none' to skip generating the style file.

type.description: Adds a developer-defined type to the filename, in the format "name.type.ts".

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new component.

flat.description: Create the new files at the top level of the current project.

skipImport.description: Do not import this component into the owning NgModule.

selector.description: The HTML selector to use for this component.

skipSelector.description: Specifies if the component should have a selector or not.

export.description: The declaring NgModule exports this component.

SchematicsAngularDirectiveSchema.title: Angular Directive Options Schema
SchematicsAngularDirectiveSchema.description: Creates a new, generic directive definition in the given or default project.

name.description: The name of the new directive.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the directive?

path.description: The path at which to create the interface that defines the directive, relative to the workspace root.

prefix.description: A prefix to apply to generated selectors.

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new class.

skipImport.description: Do not import this directive into the owning NgModule.

selector.description: The HTML selector to use for this directive.

flat.description: When true (the default), creates the new files at the top level of the current project.

export.description: The declaring NgModule exports this directive.

SchematicsAngularEnumSchema.title: Angular Enum Options Schema
SchematicsAngularEnumSchema.description: Generates a new, generic enum definition for the given or default project.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the enum?

path.description: The path at which to create the enum definition, relative to the current workspace.

project.description: The name of the project in which to create the enum. Default is the configured default project for the workspace.

type.description: Adds a developer-defined type to the filename, in the format "name.type.ts".

SchematicsAngularGuardSchema.title: Angular Guard Options Schema
SchematicsAngularGuardSchema.description: Generates a new, generic route guard definition in the given or default project.

name.description: The name of the new route guard.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the guard?

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new guard.

flat.description: When true (the default), creates the new files at the top level of the current project.

path.description: The path at which to create the interface that defines the guard, relative to the current workspace.

implements.x-prompt: Which interfaces would you like to implement?

SchematicsAngularInterceptorSchema.title: Angular Interceptor Options Schema
SchematicsAngularInterceptorSchema.description: Creates a new, generic interceptor definition in the given or default project.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the interceptor?

path.description: The path at which to create the interceptor, relative to the workspace root.

flat.description: When true (the default), creates files at the top level of the project.

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new interceptor.

SchematicsAngularInterfaceSchema.title: Angular Interface Options Schema
SchematicsAngularInterfaceSchema.description: Creates a new, generic interface definition in the given or default project.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the interface?

path.description: The path at which to create the interface, relative to the workspace root.

prefix.description: A prefix to apply to generated selectors.

type.description: Adds a developer-defined type to the filename, in the format "name.type.ts".

SchematicsAngularLibrarySchema.title: Library Options Schema
SchematicsAngularLibrarySchema.description: Creates a new, generic library project in the current workspace.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the library?

entryFile.description: The path at which to create the library's public API file, relative to the workspace root.

prefix.description: A prefix to apply to generated selectors.

skipPackageJson.description: Do not add dependencies to the "package.json" file.

skipTsConfig.description: Do not update "tsconfig.json" to add a path mapping for the new library. The path mapping is needed to use the library in an app, but can be disabled here to simplify development.

SchematicsAngularPipeSchema.title: Angular Pipe Options Schema
SchematicsAngularPipeSchema.description: Creates a new, generic pipe definition in the given or default project.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the pipe?

path.description: The path at which to create the pipe, relative to the workspace root.

flat.description: When true (the default) creates files at the top level of the project.

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new pipe.

skipImport.description: Do not import this pipe into the owning NgModule.

export.description: The declaring NgModule exports this pipe.

SchematicsAngularNgNewSchema.title: Angular Ng New Options Schema
SchematicsAngularNgNewSchema.description: Creates a new project by combining the workspace and application schematics.

directory.description: The directory name to create the workspace in.

name.description: The name of the new workspace and initial project.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the new workspace and initial project?

linkCli.description: Link the CLI to the global version (internal development only).

skipGit.description: Do not initialize a git repository.

newProjectRoot.description: The path where new projects will be created, relative to the new workspace root.

inlineStyle.description: Include styles inline in the component TS file. By default, an external styles file is created and referenced in the component TypeScript file.

inlineTemplate.description: Include template inline in the component TS file. By default, an external template file is created and referenced in the component TypeScript file.

viewEncapsulation.description: The view encapsulation strategy to use in the initial project.

version.description: The version of the Angular CLI to use.

routing.description: Generate a routing module for the initial project.

prefix.description: The prefix to apply to generated selectors for the initial project.

style.description: The file extension or preprocessor to use for style files.

skipTests.description: Do not generate "spec.ts" test files for the new project.

createApplication.description: Create a new initial application project in the 'src' folder of the new workspace. When false, creates an empty workspace with no initial application. You can then use the generate application command so that all applications are created in the projects folder.

minimal.description: Create a workspace without any testing frameworks. (Use for learning purposes only.)

strict.description: Creates a workspace with stricter type checking and stricter bundle budgets settings. This setting helps improve maintainability and catch bugs ahead of time. For more information, see https://angular.io/guide/strict-mode

packageManager.description: The package manager used to install dependencies.

SchematicsAngularResolverSchema.title: Angular resolver Options Schema
SchematicsAngularResolverSchema.description: Generates a new, generic resolver definition in the given or default project.

name.description: The name of the new resolver.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the resolver?

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new resolver.

flat.description: When true (the default), creates the new files at the top level of the current project.

path.description: The path at which to create the interface that defines the resolver, relative to the current workspace.

SchematicsAngularServiceSchema.title: Angular Service Options Schema
SchematicsAngularServiceSchema.description: Creates a new, generic service definition in the given or default project.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the service?

path.description: The path at which to create the service, relative to the workspace root.

flat.description: When true (the default), creates files at the top level of the project.

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new service.

SchematicsAngularWebWorkerSchema.title: Angular Web Worker Options Schema
SchematicsAngularWebWorkerSchema.description: Creates a new, generic web worker definition in the given or default project.

path.description: The path at which to create the worker file, relative to the current workspace.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the worker?

snippet.description: Add a worker creation snippet in a sibling file of the same name.

AngularDevkitBuildAngularBuildersAppShel.title: App Shell Target
AngularDevkitBuildAngularBuildersAppShel.description: App Shell target options for Build Facade.

browserTarget.description: A browser builder target use for rendering the application shell in the format of `project:target[:configuration]`. You can also pass in more than one configuration name as a comma-separated list. Example: `project:target:production,staging`.

serverTarget.description: A server builder target use for rendering the application shell in the format of `project:target[:configuration]`. You can also pass in more than one configuration name as a comma-separated list. Example: `project:target:production,staging`.

appModuleBundle.description: Script that exports the Server AppModule to render. This should be the main JavaScript outputted by the server target. By default we will resolve the outputPath of the serverTarget and find a bundle named 'main' in it (whether or not there's a hash tag).

inputIndexPath.description: The input path for the index.html file. By default uses the output index.html of the browser target.

outputIndexPath.description: The output path of the index.html file. By default will overwrite the input file.

AngularDevkitBuildAngularBuildersBrowser.title: Webpack browser schema for Build Facade.

main.description: The full path for the main entry point to the app, relative to the current workspace.

polyfills.description: The full path for the polyfills file, relative to the current workspace.

tsConfig.description: The full path for the TypeScript configuration file, relative to the current workspace.

scripts.description: Global scripts to be included in the build.

styles.description: Global styles to be included in the build.

inlineStyleLanguage.description: The stylesheet language to use for the application's inline component styles.

stylePreprocessorOptions.description: Options to pass to style preprocessors.

includePaths.description: Paths to include. Paths will be resolved to workspace root.

optimization.description: Enables optimization of the build output. Including minification of scripts and styles, tree-shaking, dead-code elimination, inlining of critical CSS and fonts inlining. For more information, see https://angular.io/guide/workspace-config#optimization-configuration.

scripts.description: Enables optimization of the scripts output.

styles.description: Enables optimization of the styles output.

minify.description: Minify CSS definitions by removing extraneous whitespace and comments, merging identifiers and minimizing values.

inlineCritical.description: Extract and inline critical CSS definitions to improve first paint time.

fonts.description: Enables optimization for fonts. This option requires internet access. `HTTPS_PROXY` environment variable can be used to specify a proxy server.

inline.description: Reduce render blocking requests by inlining external Google Fonts and Adobe Fonts CSS definitions in the application's HTML index file. This option requires internet access. `HTTPS_PROXY` environment variable can be used to specify a proxy server.

fileReplacements.description: Replace compilation source files with other compilation source files in the build.

outputPath.description:
The full path for the new output directory, relative to the current workspace.

By default, writes output to a folder named dist/ in the current project.

resourcesOutputPath.description: The path where style resources will be placed, relative to outputPath.

aot.description: Build using Ahead of Time compilation.

sourceMap.description: Output source maps for scripts and styles. For more information, see https://angular.io/guide/workspace-config#source-map-configuration.

scripts.description: Output source maps for all scripts.

styles.description: Output source maps for all styles.

hidden.description: Output source maps used for error reporting tools.

vendorChunk.description: Generate a seperate bundle containing only vendor libraries. This option should only used for development.

commonChunk.description: Generate a seperate bundle containing code used across multiple bundles.

baseHref.description: Base url for the application being built.

deployUrl.description: URL where files will be deployed.
deployUrl.x-deprecated: Use "baseHref" option, "APP_BASE_HREF" DI token or a combination of both instead. For more information, see https://angular.io/guide/deployment#the-deploy-url.

verbose.description: Adds more details to output logging.

progress.description: Log progress to the console while building.

i18nMissingTranslation.description: How to handle missing translations for i18n.

i18nDuplicateTranslation.description: How to handle duplicate translations for i18n.

localize.description: Translate the bundles in one or more locales.

oneOf.description: List of locales ID's to translate.

outputHashing.description: Define the output filename cache-busting hashing mode.

poll.description: Enable and define the file watching poll time period in milliseconds.

deleteOutputPath.description: Delete the output path before building.

preserveSymlinks.description: Do not use the real path when resolving modules. If unset then will default to `true` if NodeJS option --preserve-symlinks is set.

extractLicenses.description: Extract all licenses in a separate file.

showCircularDependencies.description: Show circular dependency warnings on builds.
showCircularDependencies.x-deprecated: The recommended method to detect circular dependencies in project code is to use either a lint rule or other external tooling.

buildOptimizer.description: Enables '@angular-devkit/build-optimizer' optimizations when using the 'aot' option.

namedChunks.description: Use file name for lazy loaded chunks.

subresourceIntegrity.description: Enables the use of subresource integrity validation.

serviceWorker.description: Generates a service worker config for production builds.

index.description: Configures the generation of the application's HTML index.

oneOf.description: The path of a file to use for the application's HTML index. The filename of the specified path will be used for the generated file and will be created in the root of the application's configured output path.

input.description: The path of a file to use for the application's generated HTML index.

output.description: The output path of the application's generated HTML index file. The full provided path will be used and will be considered relative to the application's configured output path.

statsJson.description: Generates a 'stats.json' file which can be analyzed using tools such as 'webpack-bundle-analyzer'.

budgets.description: Budget thresholds to ensure parts of your application stay within boundaries which you set.

webWorkerTsConfig.description: TypeScript configuration for Web Worker modules.

crossOrigin.description: Define the crossorigin attribute setting of elements that provide CORS support.

allowedCommonJsDependencies.description: A list of CommonJS packages that are allowed to be used without a build time warning.

followSymlinks.description: Allow glob patterns to follow symlink directories. This allows subdirectories of the symlink to be searched.

input.description: The input directory path in which to apply 'glob'. Defaults to the project root.

ignore.description: An array of globs to ignore.

bundleName.description: The bundle name for this extra entry point.

inject.description: If the bundle will be referenced in the HTML file.

maximumWarning.description: The maximum threshold for warning relative to the baseline.

maximumError.description: The maximum threshold for error relative to the baseline.

minimumWarning.description: The minimum threshold for warning relative to the baseline.

minimumError.description: The minimum threshold for error relative to the baseline.

warning.description: The threshold for warning relative to the baseline (min & max).

error.description: The threshold for error relative to the baseline (min & max).

AngularDevkitBuildAngularBuildersDevServ.title: Dev Server Target
AngularDevkitBuildAngularBuildersDevServ.description: Dev Server target options for Build Facade.

browserTarget.description: A browser builder target to serve in the format of `project:target[:configuration]`. You can also pass in more than one configuration name as a comma-separated list. Example: `project:target:production,staging`.

proxyConfig.description: Proxy configuration file. For more information, see https://angular.io/guide/build#proxying-to-a-backend-server.

sslKey.description: SSL key to use for serving HTTPS.

sslCert.description: SSL certificate to use for serving HTTPS.

headers.description: Custom HTTP headers to be added to all responses.

open.description: Opens the url in default browser.

verbose.description: Adds more details to output logging.

liveReload.description: Whether to reload the page on change, using live-reload.

publicHost.description: The URL that the browser client (or live-reload client, if enabled) should use to connect to the development server. Use for a complex dev server setup, such as one with reverse proxies.

allowedHosts.description: List of hosts that are allowed to access the dev server.

servePath.description: The pathname where the application will be served.

disableHostCheck.description: Don't verify connected clients are part of allowed hosts.

poll.description: Enable and define the file watching poll time period in milliseconds.

AngularDevkitBuildAngularBuildersExtract.title: Extract i18n Target
AngularDevkitBuildAngularBuildersExtract.description: Extract i18n target options for Build Facade.

browserTarget.description: A browser builder target to extract i18n messages in the format of `project:target[:configuration]`. You can also pass in more than one configuration name as a comma-separated list. Example: `project:target:production,staging`.

format.description: Output format for the generated file.

outputPath.description: Path where output will be placed.

outFile.description: Name of the file to output.

AngularDevkitBuildAngularBuildersKarmaSc.title: Karma Target
AngularDevkitBuildAngularBuildersKarmaSc.description: Karma target options for Build Facade.

main.description: The name of the main entry-point file.

tsConfig.description: The name of the TypeScript configuration file.

karmaConfig.description: The name of the Karma configuration file.

polyfills.description: The name of the polyfills file.

scripts.description: Global scripts to be included in the build.

styles.description: Global styles to be included in the build.

inlineStyleLanguage.description: The stylesheet language to use for the application's inline component styles.

stylePreprocessorOptions.description: Options to pass to style preprocessors

includePaths.description: Paths to include. Paths will be resolved to workspace root.

include.description:
Globs of files to include, relative to workspace or project root. 
There are 2 special cases:
 - when a path to directory is provided, all spec files ending ".spec.@(ts|tsx)" will be included
 - when a path to a file is provided, and a matching spec file exists it will be included instead.

sourceMap.description: Output source maps for scripts and styles. For more information, see https://angular.io/guide/workspace-config#source-map-configuration.

scripts.description: Output source maps for all scripts.

styles.description: Output source maps for all styles.

progress.description: Log progress to the console while building.

poll.description: Enable and define the file watching poll time period in milliseconds.

preserveSymlinks.description: Do not use the real path when resolving modules. If unset then will default to `true` if NodeJS option --preserve-symlinks is set.

browsers.description: Override which browsers tests are run against.

codeCoverageExclude.description: Globs to exclude from code coverage.

fileReplacements.description: Replace compilation source files with other compilation source files in the build.

reporters.description: Karma reporters to use. Directly passed to the karma runner.

webWorkerTsConfig.description: TypeScript configuration for Web Worker modules.

input.description: The input directory path in which to apply 'glob'. Defaults to the project root.

ignore.description: An array of globs to ignore.

bundleName.description: The bundle name for this extra entry point.

inject.description: If the bundle will be referenced in the HTML file.

AngularDevkitBuildAngularBuildersProtrac.title: Protractor Target
AngularDevkitBuildAngularBuildersProtrac.description: Protractor target options for Build Facade.

protractorConfig.description: The name of the Protractor configuration file.

devServerTarget.description: A dev-server builder target to run tests against in the format of `project:target[:configuration]`. You can also pass in more than one configuration name as a comma-separated list. Example: `project:target:production,staging`.

grep.description: Execute specs whose names match the pattern, which is internally compiled to a RegExp.

invertGrep.description: Invert the selection specified by the 'grep' option.

specs.description: Override specs in the protractor config.

suite.description: Override suite in the protractor config.

port.description: The port to use to serve the application.

baseUrl.description: Base URL for protractor to connect to.

main.description: The name of the main entry-point file.

tsConfig.description: The name of the TypeScript configuration file.

inlineStyleLanguage.description: The stylesheet language to use for the application's inline component styles.

stylePreprocessorOptions.description: Options to pass to style preprocessors

includePaths.description: Paths to include. Paths will be resolved to workspace root.

optimization.description: Enables optimization of the build output. Including minification of scripts and styles, tree-shaking and dead-code elimination. For more information, see https://angular.io/guide/workspace-config#optimization-configuration.

scripts.description: Enables optimization of the scripts output.

styles.description: Enables optimization of the styles output.

fileReplacements.description: Replace compilation source files with other compilation source files in the build.

outputPath.description: Path where output will be placed.

resourcesOutputPath.description: The path where style resources will be placed, relative to outputPath.

sourceMap.description: Output source maps for scripts and styles. For more information, see https://angular.io/guide/workspace-config#source-map-configuration.

scripts.description: Output source maps for all scripts.

styles.description: Output source maps for all styles.

hidden.description: Output source maps used for error reporting tools.

deployUrl.description: URL where files will be deployed.
deployUrl.x-deprecated: Use "baseHref" browser builder option, "APP_BASE_HREF" DI token or a combination of both instead. For more information, see https://angular.io/guide/deployment#the-deploy-url.

verbose.description: Adds more details to output logging.

progress.description: Log progress to the console while building.

i18nMissingTranslation.description: How to handle missing translations for i18n.

i18nDuplicateTranslation.description: How to handle duplicate translations for i18n.

localize.description: Translate the bundles in one or more locales.

oneOf.description: List of locales ID's to translate.

outputHashing.description: Define the output filename cache-busting hashing mode.

deleteOutputPath.description: Delete the output path before building.

preserveSymlinks.description: Do not use the real path when resolving modules. If unset then will default to `true` if NodeJS option --preserve-symlinks is set.

extractLicenses.description: Extract all licenses in a separate file, in the case of production builds only.

showCircularDependencies.description: Show circular dependency warnings on builds.
showCircularDependencies.x-deprecated: The recommended method to detect circular dependencies in project code is to use either a lint rule or other external tooling.

namedChunks.description: Use file name for lazy loaded chunks.

bundleDependencies.description: Which external dependencies to bundle into the bundle. By default, all of node_modules will be bundled.

externalDependencies.description: Exclude the listed external dependencies from being bundled into the bundle. Instead, the created bundle relies on these dependencies to be available during runtime.

statsJson.description: Generates a 'stats.json' file which can be analyzed using tools such as 'webpack-bundle-analyzer'.

poll.description: Enable and define the file watching poll time period in milliseconds.

AngularDevkitBuildAngularBuildersNgPacka.title: ng-packagr Target
AngularDevkitBuildAngularBuildersNgPacka.description: ng-packagr target options for Build Architect. Use to build library projects.

project.description: The file path for the ng-packagr configuration file, relative to the current workspace.

tsConfig.description: The full path for the TypeScript configuration file, relative to the current workspace.
